title: 45 Perfect Stocking Stuffers for Your Wife (or Anyone, Really)
description: It’s the little things, after all.
excerpt: Whether she loves a beauty gift set,﻿ or you’re in search of a great present you can overnight from Amazon Prime﻿, these are 45 best stocking stuffers for wives.
text: The Chic Cosmetic CaseMansur Gavriel Small Bellezza PouchIt’s confession o’clock: I sometimes use a ziplock bag for toiletries. I need an upgrade, and so does she.Olive Oil SamplerBrightland Mini Essentials Oil and Vinegar SetFor the foodie on your list, opt for Brightland’s mini-bottle quartet of olive oil and vinegar. It’ll surprise the palates of the most particular gourmands.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTinted Lip BalmsGoop The Tinted Balm TrioA collaboration between Augustinus Bader and director Sofia Coppola, lip balm simply doesn't get chicer than this tinted trio.New WalletSaint Laurent Small YSL Flap Wallet in Python-Embossed LeatherOne fresh cardholder, coming right up.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTimeless TimepieceTory Burch Tory Burch Mini Eleanor Double Wrap WatchA nice watch isn’t just a gift; it’s an investment.The Little LuxuryChanel Chance Perfumed Hand CreamsChanel’s iconic perfume now comes in a set of hand creams, so she can keep one in her purse, one at her desk, and one in the car.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowPassport CaseCuyana Passport CaseA passport cover is the smallest yet chicest travel upgrade you can give her—second only to the first class upgrade, of course.Coveted FragranceMaison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540 Body Oil It’s the fragrance on everyone’s mind, and while a full-size bottle of the perfume comes with a hefty price tag, this body oil is within reach.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Stationery SaviorDior NotebookWhether she's big on journaling or jotting down all of her creative ideas, she'll thank you for this beautiful way to store all of her writings.The Velvet OrganizerBenevolence LA Plush Velvet Jewelry BoxIf her jewelry is getting out of control on the nightstand, this chic little organizer is exactly what she needs.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLuxe & Practical Bottega Veneta Airpods Case If you didn’t get her that Bottega Veneta bag from her wishlist, you could appease her with this Airpods case. The Phone AccessoryOssa Pave Disco Mini WristletIf she's always losing her phone, this pretty little strap will help her keep up with her device.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Cozy GiftUGG Pom Pom Fleece LinedSocks, Cream, O/SAllegedly, you can tell which generation someone belongs to based on the height of their socks. I don’t know know how true that is, but I do know that Ugg socks are some of the finest out there.Playing Cards Tizo Design Lucite Card Box SetOne fun fact about me is that I keep a deck of cards in my purse at all times. She might not do that, per se, but a chic card set is still a great thing to have around the house.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Room RefresherDiptyque Baies Car Fragrance Diffuser and Refill Insert SetLittle paper trees hanging from the rearview mirror? Please, she’s far too refined for that. Fun Novelty Clarkson Potter Publishers The Pasta Tarot: A 78-Card Deck for Delicious DivinationOn the rare occasion that you find an item that perfectly captures your most niche, unrelated interests or obsessions, you just have to buy it. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMeaningful RingAurate Toi et Moi Gemstone Classic RingThese Aurate rings can be personalized to feature two gemstones. Most people opt for their own birthstone and that of their partners. She’ll love it—I promise. Team BondingWe’re Not Really Strangers Couples Edition Card Game Your wife is guaranteed to swoon over this. You might regret it later, but it’s a surefire win. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSafety FirstBirdie The Original Personal Safety AlarmIt’s not quite fun, but it is important. At-Home PedicureTenoverten The Sole Mate Foot Balm Customers swear by this foot balm, as do I. I slather it on as soon as I step out of the shower, then slip into socks, and I never have to worry about my heels cracking.
html:
The Chic Cosmetic Case

Mansur Gavriel Small Bellezza Pouch

It’s confession o’clock: I sometimes use a ziplock bag for toiletries. I need an upgrade, and so does she.

Olive Oil Sampler

Brightland Mini Essentials Oil and Vinegar Set

For the foodie on your list, opt for Brightland’s mini-bottle quartet of olive oil and vinegar. It’ll surprise the palates of the most particular gourmands.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tinted Lip Balms

Goop The Tinted Balm Trio

A collaboration between Augustinus Bader and director Sofia Coppola, lip balm simply doesn't get chicer than this tinted trio.

New Wallet

Saint Laurent Small YSL Flap Wallet in Python-Embossed Leather

One fresh cardholder, coming right up.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Timeless Timepiece

Tory Burch Tory Burch Mini Eleanor Double Wrap Watch

A nice watch isn’t just a gift; it’s an investment.

The Little Luxury

Chanel Chance Perfumed Hand Creams

Chanel’s iconic perfume now comes in a set of hand creams, so she can keep one in her purse, one at her desk, and one in the car.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Passport Case

Cuyana Passport Case

A passport cover is the smallest yet chicest travel upgrade you can give her—second only to the first class upgrade, of course.

Coveted Fragrance

Maison Francis Kurkdjian Baccarat Rouge 540 Body Oil

It’s the fragrance on everyone’s mind, and while a full-size bottle of the perfume comes with a hefty price tag, this body oil is within reach.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Stationery Savior

Dior Notebook

Whether she's big on journaling or jotting down all of her creative ideas, she'll thank you for this beautiful way to store all of her writings.

The Velvet Organizer

Benevolence LA Plush Velvet Jewelry Box

If her jewelry is getting out of control on the nightstand, this chic little organizer is exactly what she needs.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Luxe & Practical

Bottega Veneta Airpods Case

If you didn’t get her that Bottega Veneta bag from her wishlist, you could appease her with this Airpods case.

The Phone Accessory

Ossa Pave Disco Mini Wristlet

If she's always losing her phone, this pretty little strap will help her keep up with her device.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Cozy Gift

UGG Pom Pom Fleece LinedSocks, Cream, O/S

Allegedly, you can tell which generation someone belongs to based on the height of their socks. I don’t know know how true that is, but I do know that Ugg socks are some of the finest out there.

Playing Cards

Tizo Design Lucite Card Box Set

One fun fact about me is that I keep a deck of cards in my purse at all times. She might not do that, per se, but a chic card set is still a great thing to have around the house.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Room Refresher

Diptyque Baies Car Fragrance Diffuser and Refill Insert Set

Little paper trees hanging from the rearview mirror? Please, she’s far too refined for that.

Fun Novelty

Clarkson Potter Publishers The Pasta Tarot: A 78-Card Deck for Delicious Divination

On the rare occasion that you find an item that perfectly captures your most niche, unrelated interests or obsessions, you just have to buy it.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Meaningful Ring

Aurate Toi et Moi Gemstone Classic Ring

These Aurate rings can be personalized to feature two gemstones. Most people opt for their own birthstone and that of their partners. She’ll love it—I promise.

Team Bonding

We’re Not Really Strangers Couples Edition Card Game

Your wife is guaranteed to swoon over this. You might regret it later, but it’s a surefire win.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Safety First

Birdie The Original Personal Safety Alarm

It’s not quite fun, but it is important.

At-Home Pedicure

Tenoverten The Sole Mate Foot Balm

Customers swear by this foot balm, as do I. I slather it on as soon as I step out of the shower, then slip into socks, and I never have to worry about my heels cracking.
